text: @narendramodi @prayutofficial #Covid19 weakest link is public movement in mass transit-"Avoid". Govt should arrange for food, medical facilities & others at places where people are already. Migrant workers will help businesses where they are. Govt should construct infra to help poor daily laborers, pilgrims.
